summary: Successfully completed 7 commits. Committed 7 file change(s)

commits.message:
chore(config): update last run log with execution failure

Updated .kcmt/last_run.json to reflect a failed run where all 7 files
timed out after retries. Provider switched from xai to openai, model
updated to gpt-5-mini-2025-08-07, and duration increased significantly
due to timeouts. No commits or deletions succeeded, marking a full
failure compared to previous successful run. Errors cleared, indicating
no push issues but persistent timeout problems.

feat(commit): add request_timeout parameter support

Add optional `request_timeout` parameter to `suggest_commit_message` and
`suggest_commit_message_async` methods to allow specifying a timeout for
LLM requests. Include helper function `_supports_request_timeout` using
`inspect` to conditionally pass the timeout to the LLM client if its
method supports it, enabling better control over request durations and
preventing indefinite hangs.

feat(cmt): add adaptive timeouts and timeout support to commit…

Implement adaptive timeout logic that dynamically adjusts timeout values
based on failures, with an upper ceiling. Add optional request_timeout
parameter to _prepare_single_change method to pass timeouts to the
underlying generator when supported. This improves reliability and
performance for long-running commit message generations, particularly
when using external APIs like OpenAI, while disabling adaptiveness
during tests.

feat(llm): add request timeout support

Add optional `request_timeout` parameter to LLM client methods for
controlling API call timeouts to OpenAI and Anthropic providers,
improving reliability in slow network conditions.

feat(anthropic): add async invoke and request timeout support

Refactor invoke method to accept optional request_timeout parameter.
Extract common logic into _build_messages_request and
_handle_messages_response. Add async invoke_async method for
asynchronous requests. Improve type hints and error handling for
robustness.

feat(openai): add async client support

Add asynchronous client instantiation and invocation methods for
improved performance in async contexts. Refactor client factory logic to
handle timeout parameters robustly, reducing instantiation failures.
Extract response parsing into helper methods for better maintainability.
